RegMapEntry

Entry for future register map.

Variable
isOutdated

Indicates the register has been renamed

tag

The pointer for physical register file

OboeFutureRegMap
interface
OboeFutureRegMap
Method
lookup
method RegMapEntry lookup(
ArchRegId 
index
)

Lookup the tag for physical register file in future register map.

Parameter
index
ArchRegId

Architectural register index to look up in future register map.

Returns

RegMapEntry for the corresponding index.

rename
method Action rename(
ArchRegId 
rd,
Tag 
tag
)

Rename the future register map entry with the given tag.

Parameter
rd
ArchRegId

The ID of the destination register to be renamed

tag
Tag

Tag to rename.

restore
method Action restore(
Vector #(
NumArchRegs, Reg#(Tag)) 
arm
)

Update all the entries in future register map with entries in architectural register map.

Parameter
arm
Vector(NumArchRegs, Reg#(Tag))

The whole architectural register map vector.

mkOboeFutureRegMap
module mkOboeFutureRegMap(
OboeFutureRegMap
)

The future register map is in charge of maintaining the renamed tags. The module contains two vectors: tag_vector and outdated_vector. The combination of the two is the future register map.
